page.title: 07HOME LIFE .5.
page.content: Family Life,Saturday.Andrew Bostock. My brother Christopher gets up at 7.00a.m. and dad,Sue ,Katherine and I get up at 9.30a.m..Then I have my breakfast.I watch Saturday Super Store until Grandstand.I then watch football.When that has finished dad,Sue,Kathryn,Christopher and I go to my Grandad's who lives in Blurton, Stoke-on-Trent.We arrive at about 1.00p.m. then we have Shepherd's pie.At 2.15p.m. we go to watch Stoke City Football Club at the Victoria ground. They kick off at 3.00p.m. and finish at 4.40p.m..Then we go back for tea. After we've finished we watch T.V.. At 9.00p.m. we visit Mrs.Plant where we watch T.V. then go home. We get home at 10.00p.m. and watch Match of the Day before going to bed.
